com.pushwoosh

Class PushManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pushwoosh.PushManager
  • Deprecated. 
    As of release 5.0.0, replaced by Pushwoosh, PushwooshBadge, PushwooshLocation, PushwooshInApp, PushwooshBeacon

    @Deprecated
public class PushManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Push notifications manager.

    • Field Detail

      • REGISTER_EVENT

        public static final java.lang.String REGISTER_EVENT
        Deprecated. 
        BaseRegistrationReceiver intent extra key. Indicates successful push registration. Push token is stored in intent extras under this key.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • REGISTER_ERROR_EVENT

        public static final java.lang.String REGISTER_ERROR_EVENT
        Deprecated. 
        BaseRegistrationReceiver intent extra key. Indicates unsuccessful push registration. Error description is stored in intent extras under this key.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • UNREGISTER_EVENT

        public static final java.lang.String UNREGISTER_EVENT
        Deprecated. 
        BaseRegistrationReceiver intent extra key. Indicates successful push unregistration. Push token is stored in intent extras under this key.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        public static final java.lang.String PUSH_RECEIVE_EVENT
        Deprecated.

    • Method Detail

      • initializePushManager

        public static void initializePushManager(Context context,
                                         java.lang.String appId,
                                         java.lang.String projectId)
        Deprecated. 
        Init push manager with Pushwoosh App ID and Project ID for GCM. Use either this function or place the values in AndroidManifest.xml as per documentation.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        appId - Pushwoosh Application ID
        projectId - ProjectID from Google GCM

      • getInstance

        public static PushManager getInstance(Context context)
        Deprecated. 
        Returns current instance of PushManager. Can return null if Project ID or Pushwoosh App Id not given.
        Parameters:
        context - context

      • setUserId

        public void setUserId(Context context,
                      java.lang.String userId)
        Deprecated. As of release 5.0.0, replaced by PushwooshInApp.setUserId(String)
        Set User indentifier. This could be Facebook ID, username or email, or any other user ID. This allows data and events to be matched across multiple user devices.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        userId - user id

      • mergeUserId

        public void mergeUserId(java.lang.String oldUserId,
                        java.lang.String newUserId,
                        boolean doMerge,
                        PushManager.MergeUserCallback callback)
        Deprecated. As of release 5.0.0, replaced by PushwooshInApp.mergeUserId(String, String, boolean, Callback)
        Move all event statistics from oldUserId to newUserId if doMerge is true. If doMerge is false all events for oldUserId are removed.
        Parameters:
        oldUserId - source user identifier
        newUserId - destination user identifier
        doMerge - merge/remove events for source user identifier
        callback - method completion callback

      • scheduleLocalNotification

        public static int scheduleLocalNotification(Context context,
                                            java.lang.String message,
                                            int seconds)
        Deprecated. As of release 5.0.0, replaced by Pushwoosh.scheduleLocalNotification(LocalNotification)
        Schedules a local notification
        Parameters:
        context - context
        message - notification message
        seconds - delay (in seconds) until the message will be sent
        Returns:
        local notification id

      • scheduleLocalNotification

        public static int scheduleLocalNotification(Context context,
                                            java.lang.String message,
                                            Bundle extras,
                                            int seconds)
        Deprecated. As of release 5.0.0, replaced by Pushwoosh.scheduleLocalNotification(LocalNotification)
        Schedules a local notification with extras

        Extras parameters: title - message title, same as message parameter l - link to open when notification has been tapped b - banner URL to show in the notification instead of text u - user data i - identifier string of the image from the app to use as the icon in the notification ci - URL of the icon to use in the notification

        Parameters:
        context - context
        message - notification message
        extras - notification extras parameters
        seconds - delay (in seconds) until the message will be sent
        Returns:
        local notification id
